name: structured-log
description: A structured logging framework for JavaScript, inspired by Serilog.

scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register -r core-js/es6/weak-map -r core-js/es6/promise -r core-js/fn/array/find -r core-js/fn/array/is-array
scripts.build: npm run build-es5 && npm run build-es6

author: structured-log Contributors
